A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie forces you to analyse the actions and foreshadowing of the story in order to arrive at a deeper meaning that any other Star Wars story before it.  It's ironic that some fans have a problem with that\, given that they usually analyse every word and action of the original trilogy.  After some time passes\, this will go down as one of the top 5 best Star Wars movies of all time.
